ygData.subject: Thanx all
ygData.msgSnippet: I would just like to thank all of those that responded to my msg.  I feel alot better now, partly from venting, partly from your help and partly from realizing
ygData.messageBody:
I would just like to thank all of those that responded to my msg. I feel alot better now, partly from venting, partly from your help and partly from realizing what my main problem was.

I have been playing EQ every and I mean every day (except for downtime between beta and public) since November 11th. I think I just had a breakdown from to much of the game. My problem is I am extremely bored with the game but at the same time I can't stop playing.

I have never had a problem with the gender thing before now. People would ask me "Are you a female in real life?" I would always answer them with this question, "Are you a Wood Elf in real life?", that usualy shuts em up.

I really hope this guild thing works out on Brell, I love grouping in EQ but it seems harder and harder every day to find a good group. You guys seem like a very nice group of folks so I don't think that will be a prob. =)

Tiger
